name: Elastic People
description:
For the last 10 years Elastic People has been where the world is now and where traditional advertising agencies want to be in the future: we’re at the intersection of entertainment and advertising. Design has been our language. Multicultural has been our culture. Social has been our network. We're visual agents of disruption looking to change the status quo. We seek clients who want to challenge industry conventions and their consumers mindsets.
Clients who understand the evolution of a brand, but are not afraid of revolution. Creatively and functionally, Elastic People is able to quickly expand our reach and our role as required to achieve what our clients want from us: to take their brands to global stardom. Let us leverage our dynamic design sensibilities and our multidisciplinary mindset to transform the value of your brand. Elastic People is an innovation agency located in the heart of Miami's Design District. We are graphic designers, technologists, image consultants, filmmakers, content producers and above all, experience designers. Since 2002, we have gathered many international awards and accolades collaborating with some of the world's most influential icons and respected brands including: ABC Networks, Atlantic Records, AT&T, Capitol Records, Deutsche Bank, Interscope Records, Nike, Pepsi, Reebok,  Rock & Republic, Sony Music, Universal Music and Warner Music Group to name a few.
